name: Beats Dr DJ Dub Step Hop Free
name_original: Beats Dr DJ Dub Step Hop Free
description:
Move with the beat in this fast paced run and dodge game! Will you make the ultimate DJ moves? Mix the beats and avoid crashing the turntables!

Simple controls just use your finger to move and create that top selling rhythm!

* 3 funky characters to choose!
* Beats, pickups and more!
* Game Center Leaderboards.

DOWNLOAD IT AND DROP THAT BEAT TODAY!
